notes:
### v1.3.10
#### BUG FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS
- attempt to fix some logs missing local player
- when boss only damage is turned on, meter does not start until boss is attacked
- increase local player column width when expanded
#### NEW FEATURES (v1.3.8)
- added boss only damage option. meter will only track bosses that are considered Bosses or Legion Commanders
full patch notes on github
send bug reports/suggestions to discord.gg/sbSa3pkDF5
